attributes.action: Honour the commitment to take 3000 child refugees
attributes.background: The UK government committed to help thousands of unaccompanied child refugees in Europe. The world is in the midst of the largest refugee crisis since the second world war and history will not forgive you for closing our borders to these desperate children.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
